reviewText: Denzel won an Oscar playing the character in this film.  He put on some weight and the darkness of this character was hard to the core.  I have seem many of Denzels fine acting, but his character here is the darkest its ever been as field operative detective.  Ethan played his role as a rookie  well here but clearly, Denzel's transformation was powerful in this film due to the natures of both the characters as a noobie and a seasoned veteran.  I was impressed.
very good actor love his movies
Excellent. Thank you very much for your prompt delivery.

In this movie Washington displayed one of his best performances ever... that is why he won an Oscar for this one!!! If you like Washington, and you like great performances then this one is a movie you have to have in your collection!!!!
Perfect blu ray edition for a wonderful movie. Big fan of Denzel and anyone who holds the same sentiments as me will highly enjoy this gritty crime drama.
Satisfied with purchase. Great buy from seller.
one of my favorite Denzel Washington movies!!!
Terrific movie. A denzel Washington classic. Anyone who hasn't seen it needs to.
I was shocked at the content of the movie but Denzel is an awesome actor as usual!  It's definitely not a boring movie!!!
Great movie. Watched it for the first time with t he wife the other day and we both loved it. Great performances.
